name: LIVE CORP
description:
Basel is a city where people live in  constant work, but it is also the city where  the economy does not go up or down  but remains well, even the population is not large, over time it has been seen that the use of natural energy in some of natural energy, for that reason people  were hired who can collect the energy machinery instruments for electricity with the aim of not changing the way of living in the population

FEATURES:  

-Mao runs, turns, backs up, jumps. 

-It has two turns (right and left).

  

-Collect coins.  -Collect viruses. 

 

-Avoid touching the antivirus.
